languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g}, как и любые {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} — грязное пятно на лике галактики, однако им не откажешь в технологическом превосходстве. Они презирают и боятся варп-колдовства, потому полагаются на творения своего извращенного интеллекта — и многие из их творений способны на такое, что со стороны может показаться неискушенному свидетелю колдовством. Похищение солнца — одно из подобных деяний".

"Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g}, как и любые {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} — грязное пятно на лике галактики, однако им не откажешь в технологическом превосходстве. Они презирают и боятся варп-колдовства, потому полагаются на творения своего извращенного интеллекта — и многие из их творений способны на такое, что со стороны может показаться неискушенному свидетелю колдовством. Похищение солнца — одно из подобных деяний".

They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

languages.text: “和所有其他{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}一样，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}是整个银河系的祸害，但他们拥有无可争议的技术优势。他们极其厌恶、惧怕亚空间的巫术，正因如此，他们非常依赖扭曲智慧的产物。对无知之人而言，他们的技术恐怕和巫术也差不了多少，窃取恒星就是他们的技术能力之一。”
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: “和所有其他{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}一样，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}是整个银河系的祸害，但他们拥有无可争议的技术优势。他们极其厌恶、惧怕亚空间的巫术，正因如此，他们非常依赖扭曲智慧的产物。对无知之人而言，他们的技术恐怕和巫术也差不了多少，窃取恒星就是他们的技术能力之一。”

languages.text: « Comme tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} sont un fléau pour notre galaxie, mais leur supériorité technologique est indéniable. Comme ils abhorrent et craignent par-dessus tout ce qui touche au Warp, ils se reposent uniquement sur les créations de leur propre intellect... dont la grande majorité est capable de prodiges qui, pour un public ignorant, peut s'apparenter à de la sorcellerie. Le vol du soleil en est le parfait exemple. »
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: « Comme tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} sont un fléau pour notre galaxie, mais leur supériorité technologique est indéniable. Comme ils abhorrent et craignent par-dessus tout ce qui touche au Warp, ils se reposent uniquement sur les créations de leur propre intellect... dont la grande majorité est capable de prodiges qui, pour un public ignorant, peut s'apparenter à de la sorcellerie. Le vol du soleil en est le parfait exemple. »

languages.text: «Como todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} son una mancha en la galaxia, pero su superioridad tecnológica es indiscutible. Temen y aborrecen la hechicería de disformidad, y por eso recurren a las creaciones de sus retorcidas mentes, muchas de las cuales parecen iguales a la hechicería a ojos de los legos en la materia. El robo de un sol es solo un ejemplo de las cosas de las que son capaces».
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: «Como todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} son una mancha en la galaxia, pero su superioridad tecnológica es indiscutible. Temen y aborrecen la hechicería de disformidad, y por eso recurren a las creaciones de sus retorcidas mentes, muchas de las cuales parecen iguales a la hechicería a ojos de los legos en la materia. El robo de un sol es solo un ejemplo de las cosas de las que son capaces».

languages.text: 「全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と同様に、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は、銀河系に害をなす存在だ。ただ、他より技術的に優れているのは明確で、彼らは<歪み>の魔術を嫌い、恐れている。だからこそ、歪んだ発想で生み出した創造物に頼っているのだ。この創造物の技術を目撃した無知な者達は、魔術だと勘違いしてしまうだろう。例えば太陽の窃盗が、彼らの能力の内のひとつだ」
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: 「全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と同様に、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は、銀河系に害をなす存在だ。ただ、他より技術的に優れているのは明確で、彼らはワープ魔術を嫌い、恐れている。だからこそ、歪んだ発想で生み出した創造物に頼っている野田。この創造物の技術を目撃した無知な者達は、魔術だと勘違いしてしまうだろう。例えば太陽の窃盗が、彼らの能力の内のひとつだ 」

「全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と同様に、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は、銀河系に害をなす存在だ。ただ、他より技術的に優れているのは明確で、彼らは<歪み>の魔術を嫌い、恐れている。だからこそ、歪んだ発想で生み出した創造物に頼っているのだ。この創造物の技術を目撃した無知な者達は、魔術だと勘違いしてしまうだろう。例えば太陽の窃盗が、彼らの能力の内のひとつだ」

languages.text: "Wie alle {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} sind auch die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} eine Seuche für die Galaxie, doch ihre technologische Überlegenheit lässt sich nicht abstreiten. Sie verabscheuen und fürchten Warp-Hexerei, daher verlassen sie sich auf die Schöpfungen ihres kranken Intellekts. Und viele dieser Schöpfungen sind zu Dingen fähig, die für das unbedarfte Auge selbst wie Hexerei wirken. Der Diebstahl einer Sonne ist ein Beispiel, wozu sie fähig sind."
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: "Wie alle {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} sind auch die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} eine Seuche für die Galaxie, doch ihre technologische Überlegenheit lässt sich nicht abstreiten. Sie verabscheuen und fürchten Warp-Hexerei, daher verlassen sie sich auf die Schöpfungen ihres kranken Intellekts. Und viele dieser Schöpfungen sind zu Dingen fähig, die für das unbedarfte Auge selbst wie Hexerei wirken. Der Diebstahl einer Sonne ist ein Bespiel, wozu sie fähig sind."

languages.text: "Her {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} gibi {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} de galaksiye musallat olmuş bir vebadır. Fakat teknolojik üstünlükleri de su götürmez bir hakikat. Öteboyut sahirliğinden tiksinir ve korkarlar; bu sebepten de o çarpık zekâlarıyla tasarladıkları icatlarına güvenirler. Bu icatların çoğu, öyle şeylere kadirdirler ki bilgisiz akıllara sahirlik gibi görünür. Güneş çalmak da bunlara bir örnek."
languages.original_text: "Like all {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are a blight on the face of the galaxy, but their technological superiority is indisputable. They abhor and fear warp sorcery, which is why they rely on creations of their twisted intellect — and many of those creations are capable of things that may seem akin to sorcery to the unenlightened eye. The theft of a sun is one example of what they are capable of."

traits.locale_text: "Her {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} gibi {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} de galakside görülmüş en rezil yaratıklardan biridir. Fakat teknolojik üstünlükleri tartışılamaz. Öteboyut sahirliğinden tiksinir ve korkarlar, bu yüzden de kendi korkunç zekâlarıyla tasarladıkları yaratımlarına güvenirler. Bu yaratımların çoğu, yobaz akıllara sahirlik gibi görünür. Güneş çalmak, kabiliyetlerinin örneklerinden biridir."
